name: CryptSwitcher
description:
CRYPT SWITCHER

CryptSwitcher is a puzzle game made for the GeoJam2022. In this game you have to switch to the other side in order to solve puzzles. More simply, you have to control the enemies. There are 10 levels and a tutorial. 

You can play in the browser (Support Gamepad and Keyboard), but the Windows build will give you a way better experience.

Good Luck !

Water can be a little buggy...

SFX / Music: Epidemic Sound
